name: AsMagnet
description:
This is a 3D gimmick puzzle game where you search for a solution while going around the stages in a 3D space studded with gimmicks.
You can clear the stage by operating the separated lovers Romeo and Juliet and sticking them together safely.

・ Move in 4 directions and switch the operating character. Simple but a little new. And it's so difficult.
・ All 50 stages, you can play from anywhere
・ Compatible with mouse and keyboard, gamepad
